revised_title: Vibrations and Deformation of Thin Elastic Shells
tldr: The author applies Kirchhoff and Clebsch's method to the case of a thin shell, deriving the equations of equilibrium and small motion under the action of any system of forces. The study focuses on the potential-energy-function for the strain in an element of the shell and the conditions for free edges. The paper also discusses spherical and cylindrical shells, as well as surfaces of uniform curvature.
